products.name: Aloe Vera
products.description: Aloe Vera is a versatile and low-maintenance plant known for its soothing gel and air-purifying properties. Perfect for your indoor garden.

products.name: Snake Plant
products.description: Snake Plant, also known as Mother-in-Law's Tongue, is an elegant and hardy plant that improves air quality and thrives in low light.

products.name: Ficus Elastica
products.description: Ficus Elastica, commonly called the Rubber Plant, is a stunning indoor plant with broad, glossy leaves that add a tropical touch to any space.

products.name: Monstera Deliciosa
products.description: Monstera Deliciosa, also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a statement-making houseplant with its large, perforated leaves.

products.name: ZZ Plant
products.description: ZZ Plant is a resilient and stylish indoor plant that requires minimal care, making it a great choice for busy plant parents.

products.name: Spider Plant
products.description: Spider Plant is a classic houseplant known for its graceful, arching leaves and air-purifying qualities. Great for beginners!

products.name: Philodendron
products.description: Philodendron is a lush and easy-to-care-for plant that brings a touch of greenery and calm to your indoor spaces.

products.name: Pothos
products.description: Pothos, also called Devil's Ivy, is a fast-growing, trailing plant perfect for hanging baskets and improving indoor air quality.
